item.description:
Today looks nice so let's have an impromptu walk around Marblehead Neck as we had to cancel last time. No limit as it's so last minute..it's mostly a road walk so I'm not sure if dogs will like it as there might be salt on the road. Hope some of you last-minute types will come! Please call me if you are - and rsvp with your phone number.

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: Red subaru wagon with kayak holders on top in parking lot

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Impromptu Saturday walk round Marblehead Neck!
